title: Human Population Doubling Time Equation Choice

content.question: Which of the following methods will give the best prediction for how long it will take the human population to double if the global growth rate is <math alttext="1.09" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.09</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent?

choices.label: Number of years <math alttext="equals the fraction 70 over 1.09" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.09</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
Number of years <math alttext="equals 1.09 times 70" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.09</mn><mo>Ã—</mo><mn>70</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Number of years <math alttext="equals the fraction 1.09 over 70" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.09</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

Number of years <math alttext="1.09 raised to the 70 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>1.09</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Number of years <math alttext="equals the fraction 70 over 1.09" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>70</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.09</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Determine an approach or method aligned with the problem to be solved.
